text: Yehoshua Glazer (29 December 1927 â€“ 29 December 2018) was an Israeli footballer. He played for Maccabi Tel Aviv and for the Israel national football team his entire career. He was born in Tel Aviv. Glazer died on his 91st birthday on 29 December 2018 in Tel Aviv.'Shiye' Glazer, Israeli soccer legend, passed away at 91 ==References== ==Other websites== * National team stats Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Israeli footballers Category:Sportspeople from Tel Aviv
